<script type="text/javascript" src="/js/jquery-1.4.2.js" ></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="/js/jquery/jquery.fancybox-1.3.4.js" ></script> 
<script type="text/javascript" src="/js/common.js" ></script>


<script type="text/javascript"> 

	 
	$(document).ready(function() { 
		      	
		
		var windowWidth = $(window).width();
		if(windowWidth < 970) {
		  $('#inhalt').addClass('small');
		}
		
		$('ul.sf-menu').superfish(); 
		$('#primaryNav ul li:last-child').addClass('last');
		$('.footerLeft ul li:last-child').addClass('last');
        
		$(".newsWidgetItem:nth-child(odd)") .addClass("striped");
		
		$("	.pubPhoto").fancybox();
		$("#photoWidget .photoWidgetItem:nth-child(5)").addClass("last");
		$("#photoWidget .photoWidgetItem:nth-child(9)").addClass("last");
		
		$('.formStyle').click(
			function() {
				if (this.value == this.defaultValue) {
					this.value = ''; 
				}
			}
		);
			
		$('.formStyle').blur(
			function() {
				if (this.value == '') {
					this.value = this.defaultValue;
				}
			}
		);
	});
	
</script>

<!-- Google analytics -->
<script>
  (function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){
  (i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),
  m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)
  })(window,document,'script','//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');

  ga('create', 'UA-59932446-1', 'auto');
  ga('send', 'pageview');

</script>
